title: Addicted to her Alpha Assistant: The whole story: Craving his control
description: Looking to get back to work after raising her family, happily married Adrienne takes a senior position at Interesting Antiquities Inc. One perk of her new job is her gorgeous and charismatic assistant, Gideon. However something very strange is going on at her new company. No one ever seems to do much work and her female boss is certainly not shy about fully utilizing the talents of her male employees. Despite being happily married, Adrienne herself is thrilled to accept Gideon's advances. But as their enthusiastic affair pushes past all her boundaries, it seems she is less and less in control and she cannot believe her own behavior. Before long she finds herself obsessed and desperately craving Gideon's touch, unwilling to be away from him for long.Can Adrienne untangle herself from her assistant's dark, sexual spell and uncover the secrets of Interesting Antiquities? Or is she having too much fun to even try?Please be aware that this series contains graphic sexual content and themes of mind control that some readers may find offensive. It is intended for adult audiences only.
author: Cecelie Hart
